statements: SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification WHERE user_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT * FROM identity_verification WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT * FROM identity_verification ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT user_id, address FROM identity_verification WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT full_name, address FROM identity_verification WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM identity_verification WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT address, full_name FROM identity_verification WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM identity_verification WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT user_id, address, date_of_birth FROM identity_verification WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%' AND date_of_birth BETWEEN '1970-01-01' AND '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_verification;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_verification WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address, id_proof FROM user_verification ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_history WHERE repayment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT full_name, loan_amount FROM user_verification JOIN loan_history ON user_verification.user_id = loan_history.user_id WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_verification WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_verification WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, loan_amount FROM loan_history WHERE repayment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM user_verification WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND full_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loans FROM loan_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_loans > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT loan_id, amount FROM loans WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(loan_id) AS num_loans FROM loans GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date, approved_by FROM approvals WHERE approval_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, identity_document FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT approval_id, approval_date FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT loans.loan_id, loans.amount, users.username FROM loans JOIN users ON loans.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT approvals.approved_by, users.username FROM approvals JOIN loans ON approvals.loan_id = loans.loan_id JOIN users ON loans.user_id = users.user_id WHERE approvals.approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM identity ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, amount, start_date FROM loans WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM identity WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_identity;
SELECT name, email FROM user_identity ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT amount_approved, date_approved FROM loan WHERE amount_approved > 5000;
SELECT user_id, document_type FROM document_verification WHERE is_verified = true;
SELECT asset_type, value FROM collateral WHERE value > 10000 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM user_identity WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT application_id, amount, date_applied FROM loan_application WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM document_verification WHERE user_id = 3 AND is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT loan_id, amount_approved, date_approved FROM loan WHERE date_approved >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_approved ASC;
